page.title: 19A SCHOOL DAY;PLUMSTEAD
page.content: I live in Plumstead High Street so it's quite a walk to school from my house. It takes me half an hour to walk there. When I do get to school the teacher takes the register and we have to do the work she has put on the board. We have assemblies on Tuesday, Wednesday and sometimes Thursday. We have P.E. on Monday, Wednesday Thursday, and swimming on Friday. There are 271 children in our school. We have three playtimes. The first one isa in the morning at 10.15 and the others are at 12.05 and 2.15 p.m. After that we do some more work and at 3 o'clock Mr.Bruce sometimes reads a story and at 3.30 we go home. When I get home I watch the children's programmes, do my homework, or if I do not have any I either go out to play, do the washing up, help my mum with the cooking or go shopp@ing with her. Sherima
